data.title: Apple Inc. New Headquarters
data.meta_description:
Cupertino, CA - “An integrated 21st century campus surrounded by green space”
	
	Apple's planned new headquarters is referred to as “Apple Campus 2.″ The complex will be built on a 175 acre area near the 280 highway. The total building will be about 2.8 million square feet, will feature a 1,000 seat auditorium, a fitness center, 300,000 square feet of research facilities, a power plant, and underground parking.  It is anticipated 13,000 Apple employees will work at the new facility.
data.text:
Cupertino, CA - “An integrated 21st century campus surrounded by green space”

Apple's planned new headquarters is referred to as “Apple Campus 2.″ The complex will be built on a 175 acre area near the 280 highway. The total building will be about 2.8 million square feet, will feature a 1,000 seat auditorium, a fitness center, 300,000 square feet of research facilities, a power plant, and underground parking. It is anticipated 13,000 Apple employees will work at the new facility.
